On Sat, Apr 26, 2025 at 1:05 PM Phillip ChubbyGroup <phillip@collabs.chubbygroup.com> wrote:
Hi Ryleigh, 

Thanks for the reply. Fortunately, this is a paid collaboration. 

As compensation for your authentic coverage, we'd love to offer you and a guest a complimentary fine dining experience, typically valued between $120 and $180. We’re confident this will give you plenty of great content while experiencing firsthand the outstanding cuisine, ambiance, and service we’re known for.

While additional monetary compensation isn't available for this particular collaboration, we hope this dining experience aligns well with your content style and audience engagement goals.

Let us know if you're interested in moving forward: 
a) Preferred Location 
b) Date and time for the visit (Preferably a weekday or Friday/Sunday noon) 
c) Full name for reservation 
d) A contact phone number 
e) Any dietary restrictions 

Best,
Phillip
Chubby Group


On Sunday, Apr 20, 2025 at 11:27 pm ryleigh@jexyagency.com wrote:
Hey There,

Thank you for your email and the opportunity to collaborate!

Due to a high volume of inquiries, she is currently prioritizing paid collaborations. Would you be open to discussing a paid partnership for the Creation of deliverables?

I look forward to your response.

All my best,
Ryleigh

I wanted to follow up on my previous invitation for a complimentary dining experience at Chubby Group. We'd love to host you and a guest at one of our restaurants to showcase our premium Japanese Wagyu offerings.

Looking forward to your response.

body.html:
New York. Any day 

On Thu, Apr 24, 2025 at 1:15 PM Ophelia ChubbyGroup <ophelia@collabs.chubbygroup.com> wrote:
Hi victoriaghinelli, 
 
I'm Ophelia from Chubby Group – a premium Japanese Wagyu fine-dining chain. I saw your recent video about day in the life outfit of the day meal prep on Instagram and began exploring more of your content in lifestyle topics. Your influence in your area is really impressive and I'd like to invite you for a complimentary dining experience (with plus one, usually valued at $120-$180) at any of our restaurants: 

California:
Los Angeles: Chubby Cattle Little Tokyo
Pleasanton: Chubby Cattle
Beverly Hills: Chubby Curry
Covina: Chubby Curry
Cerritos: Mikiya Wagyu Shabu House
Monterey Park: Chubby Cattle
Rowland Heights: Chubby Cattle

 
Other Cities:
New York City: NIKU X
Chicago: Chubby Cattle
Chicago: Wagyu House by The X Pot
Las Vegas: Chubby Cattle
Las Vegas: The X Pot Las Vegas
Philadelphia: Chubby Cattle
Houston: Mikiya Wagyu Shabu House


Please reply with: 
A) Yourpreferred restaurant location 
B) Your availability within the next three weeks (preferably weekdays)

Looking forward to seeing you soon,  
Ophelia
Marketing Manager
Chubby Group

Dear Vickie Maung,
Thank you for your interest in Mikiya Wagyu Shabu House Cerritos — we are excited to have you! I am confirming your reservation with our manager now, and you’ll get a final confirmation email shortly.
Your visit includes a complimentary dining experience for you and a guest, and we'd love if you shared your authentic experience with your Instagram and TikTok audiences, highlighting:


"Location: 11328 South St, Cerritos,CA, 90703

Premium Ingredients: Imported purebred A5 Wagyu beef flown in daily from Japan, Australia and have domestic ranch

Affordable Luxury: Offers four premium tiers ranging from $45 to $98, featuring American, Australian, and Japanese A5 Wagyu.

Signature Dishes: Wagyu Bone Marrow, Wagyu Nigiri, Veggies and premium seafood selections.

Premium Broths: Signature umami-rich broth made from specially chosen soup ingredients.

Modern Shabu Experience: Combines upscale hot pot dining with high-quality ingredients in a vibrant setting.

#Hashtages: #CerritosFoodie #WagyuShabu #AllYouCanEatWagyu #JapaneseHotPotLA #SoCalFoodSc

Morgan: 8186683876"

Best,
Ashley Summers

Sorry Reed, I just saw this. 
Wow I can't imagine you managed to record these many fabulous shots even with other customers and shooting activities inside! I also really like your outfits, you two literally look like professional models! Thank you so much. 

If you would like to complete our collaboration, we would appreciate a voice-over video introducing the details listed in previous email, and it could be uploaded to instagram and tiktok. Thank you for your understanding and flexibility, I apologize again for the delay in response!

﻿I apologize dear, but I didn’t see this email until I was done at your restaurant. That’s only if you’re still interested. I’ll be sending a rough draft of what I got of yesterday. What I can do is post the first video as a part one and if you allow me to come back, I can record the part two. 
Thank you so much for the invitation. The food was superb.  
Sent from my iPhone

﻿ Re: Exclusive Invitation: Premium Dining Experience with Chubby Group for ellemachele
Hi this is Jeffrey

Reed , I’m so sorry for the last-minute change, but our NIKU X NYC location is experiencing a extremely high customer traffic today and customers are having long waits, likely due to recent social media partnerships. I don’t think the conditions at the site would be suitable for shooting because of how crowded it is.

Is it possible that we move this to this Saturday or Sunday noon? I have both days' noon left open for you. Because we do not have that hours openning on the website so there's likley to be very few walk in customers and it's just for you, the quiet conditions will be nicer for shooting the video.

Apologize again!

Ok thank you. Just a slight change 24th will be dinner at 6PM. Sorry about the confusion. I have made the confirmation.

On Tuesday, Apr 22, 2025 at 3:37 pm lousplatettg@gmail.com wrote:
Yes. The 24th is fine.  And I understand everything. Looking forward to this collaboration. Your restaurant looks absolutely beautiful.  
Sent from my iPhone

On Apr 22, 2025, at 3:40 PM, jeffrey CreatoRain <jeffrey@creatorrain.com> wrote:

﻿ Re: Exclusive Invitation: Premium Dining Experience with Chubby Group for ellemachele
The requirment is to upload the video to Instagram and Tiktok. The platform is just where you can let us know you've uploaded the video and it helps us to keep the video in record. I can put a time down for 4/24 12PM noon for Lunch, does that work for you?

Here are the requirment for NIKU X NYC:
Location:
21 W 35th St New York, NY 10001 United States

First of Its Kind: They’re the only restaurant in the U.S. offering a fresh (never-frozen) A5 Wagyu steak buffet—an unlimited, premium experience hard to find anywhere else.

Wide Selection: More than 50 dishes are available, including king crab, lobster, premium seafood, and Japanese sushi. It’s a combination of AYCE (All You Can Eat) variety with high-end ingredients.

High-End & Contemporary: the interior features ultra-modern Robatayaki grills, tile mosaics, and an open-kitchen concept.

Elevated Buffet Experience:  NIKU X merges luxury dining with the indulgence of an unlimited buffet, creating a “culinary journey” that emphasizes craft and quality.

Convenient Hours: Open for dinner every day (with later hours on weekends) and weekend lunch service—a flexible schedule for those looking to enjoy fresh A5 Wagyu and premium seafood at any time.

#Hashtags: #NYC #NewYorkFoodie #NIKUX #LuxuryDiningNYC #AYCE

[Instagram]
Tag people: @nikuxnyc @chubby.group

Add location: NIKU X NYC


[Tiktok]

@ Mention: @nikuxla

Location: Midtown South (New York, United States)

Point of Contact:
ophelia: 2125108212


On Tuesday, Apr 22, 2025 at 11:40 am lousplatettg@gmail.com wrote:
Understood. I’m sure I can create a beautiful video for your restaurant. Please let me know when the next earliest availability is. 

Just to clarify, you want me to upload to my platforms and upload the video to the platform you provide provided? Or are the videos I’m producing only being used for the platform you provided?  Either way I’m in. 
Sent from my iPhone

On Apr 22, 2025, at 11:37 AM, jeffrey CreatoRain <jeffrey@creatorrain.com> wrote:

﻿ Re: Exclusive Invitation: Premium Dining Experience with Chubby Group for ellemachele

Hi Lou Reed,
Thank you so much for your interest in details about Chubby Group — we're thrilled about the potential of working together!
We’re currently offering a complimentary fine dining experience for you and a guest (valued between $120–$180) in exchange for your authentic content on Instagram and/or TikTok. During your visit, we’d love for you to highlight:
The flavor, texture, and superior quality of our purebred A5 Wagyu beef and imported seafood, flown in daily from Japan
The presentation and consistency of our culinary creations
The overall ambiance and level of service we provide
While we’re not offering additional monetary compensation for this collaboration, we’re confident this experience will provide plenty of premium content that aligns with your audience and creative style.
Feel free check out the details and upload your video directly to our platform here: https://influencers.creatorain.com/auth/creator-signup/chubby-group
Let us know if you'd like to move forward, and I’d be happy to coordinate next steps — including checking reservation availability.
Best,
jeffrey CreatoRain
Chubby Group

Hi Lou Reed,
Thank you so much for your interest in details about Chubby Group — we're thrilled about the potential of working together!
We’re currently offering a complimentary fine dining experience for you and a guest (valued between $120–$180) in exchange for your authentic content on Instagram and/or TikTok. During your visit, we’d love for you to highlight:
The flavor, texture, and superior quality of our purebred A5 Wagyu beef and imported seafood, flown in daily from Japan

items.subject: Following up on the Collaboration Opportunity

body.text:
Hi,

Thanks so much for the note! Sounds great, we typically work with a flat
fee and really appreciate your interest! Please see typical rates below:

*1x TikTok:* $3,000
*2x TikTok:* $4,000
*1x IG Reel:* $2,850
*1x IG Story:* $2,000
*TT/IG/YT UGC:* $1,000 - $3,000 per video
*YouTube Dedicated video:* $2,000 / Shorts: $2,000
*TT/IG/YT Whitelisting + Usage rights:*
    30 Days: $1,000
    60 Days: $2,000
    6 Months: $4,000

*The rates above are not our absolute minimums. If you have a tight budget
we will still make it work*

These are our standard rates, but could you tell us your best absolute
rate? We’re more than happy to find something that works for both sides.

Does that fit within your project budget at this time? Would love to
partner with you and know that this is a PERFECT match!! If needed, we are
happy to be flexible, so please let us know what works for you (we will
never be offended by any counteroffer). Excited to chat again this week!

Best,

*Marina Simoska*
Talent Relations
EMC Power <https://www.emcpower.info/>

**CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The contents of this email message and any
attachments are intended solely for the addressee(s) and may contain
confidential and/or privileged information and may be legally protected
from disclosure.*

items.subject: Re: Exclusive Dining Experience Invitation

body.text:
Hi April,




Thank you so much for the invitation — I truly appreciate the opportunity to experience Chubby Group’s premium Japanese Wagyu offerings.




I would love to visit and create a detailed food review to share with my audience. If Chubby Group would be willing to cover transportation (airfare) and hotel accommodations, I would be happy to coordinate my visit. I am currently available the weekend of May 9th–11th and would love to schedule my trip for those dates.




I look forward to the possibility of working together and showcasing your incredible dining experience!




Fallah HeardTikTok Social Media Influencer@FlourishwithfallahDirect: 601.946.3222https://vm.tiktok.com/ZTdVbXeRF/

On Saturday, April 26, 2025, 12:01 PM, April ChubbyGroup <april@collabs.chubbygroup.com> wrote:


Re: Exclusive Dining Experience Invitation Hi Fallah wilson, 
I wanted to follow up on my previous invitation for a complimentary dining experience at Chubby Group. We'd love to host you and a guest at one of our restaurants to showcase our premium Japanese Wagyu offerings.
If you're interested, please let me know your preferred location and availability within the next three weeks.
Looking forward to your response.
Best regards,AprilMarketing ManagerChubby Group


On Friday, Apr 18, 2025 at 12:36 pm april@collabs.chubbygroup.com wrote:
Hi Fallah wilson,
Thank you so much for your interest in details about Chubby Group — we're thrilled about the potential of working together!
We’re currently offering a complimentary fine dining experience for you and a guest (valued between $120–$180) in exchange for your authentic content on Instagram and/or TikTok. During your visit, we’d love for you to highlight:
The flavor, texture, and superior quality of our purebred A5 Wagyu beef and imported seafood, flown in daily from Japan
The presentation and consistency of our culinary creations
The overall ambiance and level of service we provide
While we’re not offering additional monetary compensation for this collaboration, we’re confident this experience will provide plenty of premium content that aligns with your audience and creative style.
Feel free check out the details and upload your video directly to our platform here: https://influencers.creatorain.com/auth/creator-signup/chubby-group
Let us know if you'd like to move forward, and I’d be happy to coordinate next steps — including checking reservation availability.
Best,
April ChubbyGroup
Chubby Group

On Mon, Apr 21, 2025 at 9:04 PM Morgan ChubbyGroup <morgan@collabs.chubbygroup.com> wrote:
Hi, sorry for the late reply. I have tried talking to our locations in north CA to add this reservation. Unfortunately, these locations are extremely busy recently. However, we have Chubby Cattle - Pleasanton opening up in Mid May! And I would love to have you as one of our first collaborator. May I send a follow up email and schedule a visit for you in May? Here are the details:

2693 Stoneridge Dr #106,
Pleasanton, CA 94588

Required: 
1. Premium Ingredients: Imported purebred A5 Wagyu beef flown in from Japan.

2. All-You-Can-Eat Wagyu: Offers three premium tiers ranging from $55 to $85, featuring American, Australian, and Japanese A5 Wagyu.

3. Diverse Menu: Includes not only Wagyu but also curated seafood (shrimp, scallops) and unlimited sushi (like Salmon Nigiri and Wagyu Nigiri).
Signature Hot Dishes: Features unique itemslike Wagyu Tartare, Sukiyaki Hot Pot, and A5 Wagyu Stone Pot Bibimbap.
Desserts and Snacks: Serves desserts like milk tea, ice cream, and Asian snacks. 

4. Chubby Club Membership (Clear CTA encouraging sign-ups for Chubby Club Membership)
Membership Benefits Across 35+ Locations,
Save up to $20 per visit at any Chubby Group restaurant and VIP perks 

Optional Talking Points: 
5. Affordable Luxury: Serves premium wagyu at a lower cost due to bulk purchasing and in-house partnerships.

6. Interactive Dining: Automated ordering system and tableside service for quick delivery. 

#Hashtages: #ChicagoFoodie #ChinatownEats #SushiLoversChicago #AllYouCanEatChicago

Location: Chubby Cattle Pleasanton

Thanks for reaching out! I hope you're havinga great day.
I have heard so much about Chubby Group, and would love to try Mikiya Wagyu Shabu Shabu at your San Mateo location.

My availability is as follows by order of preference:
Saturday - May 3rd, 2025 (Lunch)
Friday - May 2nd, 2025 (Dinner)
-
Tuesday - April 22nd, 2025 (Dinner)
Wednesday - April 23, 2025 (Dinner)

Please let me know if any of these dates work for your team.
With Mother's Day approaching, I was hoping I could invite my mom and brother to join me.
In return, I would love to create a short video and a series of Instagram stories showcasing Mikiya and my experience, potentially tying it as a great place to take your friends and family for a one of a kind experience.

I'd love to know your thoughts, and thank you again for reaching out to me!

Best,
Katia

The presentation and consistency of our culinary creations
The overall ambiance and level of service we provide
While we’re not offering additional monetary compensation for this collaboration, we’re confident this experience will provide plenty of premium content that aligns with your audience and creative style.
Feel free check out the details and upload your video directly to our platform here: https://influencers.creatorain.com/auth/creator-signup/chubby-group
Let us know if you'd like to move forward, and I’d be happy to coordinate next steps — including checking reservation availability.
Best,
Blair ChubbyGroup
Chubby Group

body.text:
I apologize dear, but I didn’t see this email until I was done at your restaurant. I definitely got some beautiful footage however I do feel like if you want to invite me back and give me a more private area I’ll be able to take advantage of the beauty of the dishes, a little bit more. I also mentioned that even though hand rolls are very delicious and the quality is superb, I can create more of a viral moment if you give me a piece of crab to bite into or something saucy and drippy. Crab saucy things caviar these are all things that are going viral on TikTok right now. 
That’s only if you’re still interested. I’ll be sending a rough draft of what I got of yesterday. What I can do is post the first video as a part one and if you allow me to come back, I can record the part two. 
Thank you so much for the invitation. The food was superb.  
Sent from my iPhone

body.html:
I apologize dear, but I didn’t see this email until I was done at your restaurant. I definitely got some beautiful footage however I do feel like if you want to invite me back and give me a more private area I’ll be able to take advantage of the beauty of the dishes, a little bit more. I also mentioned that even though hand rolls are very delicious and the quality is superb, I can create more of a viral moment if you give me a piece of crab to bite into or something saucy and drippy. Crab saucy things caviar these are all things that are going viral on TikTok right now. 
That’s only if you’re still interested. I’ll be sending a rough draft of what I got of yesterday. What I can do is post the first video as a part one and if you allow me to come back, I can record the part two. 
Thank you so much for the invitation. The food was superb.  
Sent from my iPhone

Location:

Convenient Hours: Open for dinner every day (with later hours on weekends) and weekend lunch service—a flexible schedule for those looking to enjoy fresh A5 Wagyu and premium seafood at any time.

Hi knightsglow, 
 
I'm Phillip from Chubby Group – a premium Japanese Wagyu fine-dining chain. I saw your recent video about baby food hacks on Instagram and began exploring more of your content in motherhood recipes topics. Your influence in your area is really impressive and I'd like to invite you for a complimentary dining experience (with plus one, usually valued at $120-$180) at any of our restaurants: 

California:
Los Angeles: Chubby Cattle Little Tokyo
Beverly Hills: Chubby Curry
Covina: Chubby Curry
Cerritos: Mikiya Wagyu Shabu House
Monterey Park, Chubby Cattle
Pleasanton, Chubby Cattle
 
Other Cities:

Las Vegas: Chubby Cattle

Philadelphia: Chubby Cattle
Houston: Mikiya Wagyu Shabu House

A) Your preferred restaurant location 
B) Your availability within the next three weeks (preferably weekdays)

Looking forward to seeing you soon,  
Phillip
Marketing Manager
Chubby Group

Dear Christina Jimenez,
Thank you for your interest in The X Pot Las Vegas — we are excited to have you!​ I am confirming your reservation with our manager now, and you’ll get a final confirmation email shortly.
Your visit includes a complimentary dining experience for you and aguest, and we'd love if you shared your authentic experience with your Instagram and TikTok audiences, highlighting:


"Location: Grand Canal Shoppes At The Palazzo, Fl 2 3327 S Las Vegas Blvd, Suite 2884 Las Vegas

Premium Ingredients: A5 Wagyu, hot pot broth crafted from pure spring water and premium ingredients.

Affordable Luxury: We serve premium Wagyu, sourced from the finest supply chain for unparalleled quality.

Futuristic Dining Experience: 360-degree HD projections and interactive light shows.

Interactive Dining: Diners cook their own ingredients tableside and can enjoy exclusive live performances, such as the face-changing ceremony and noodle dance, with select dishes.

High-End Fusion Cuisine: Features unique dishes like Wagyu Tartarte and King Crab Cake, blending Asian and Western culinary traditions.

Exclusive Meat Offerings: Certified Kobe beef and expertly aged Wagyu.

Luxury Atmosphere: Offers a unique blend of fine dining and entertainment, creating a multi-sensory culinary experience.

Signature Dishes: The Chef's Tasting Menu offers an exquisite selection, including Wagyu Tartare, Bone Marrow Bibimbap, Golden Wagyu Rice with Truffle, and more, accompanied by a rich broth and an extensive array of premium ingredients for cooking.

Interactive Dining: Guests pick ingredients and cook them in hot pots at the table, automated ordering system and tableside service for quick delivery.

First of Its Kind: They’re the only restaurant in the U.S. offering a fresh (never-frozen) A5 Wagyu steak buffet—an unlimited, premium experience hard to find anywhere else.

Wide Selection: More than 50 dishes are available, including king crab, lobster, premium seafood, and Japanese sushi. It’s a combination of AYCE (All You Can Eat) variety with high-end ingredients.

High-End & Contemporary: the interior features ultra-modern Robatayaki grills, tile mosaics, and an open-kitchen concept.

Elevated Buffet Experience: NIKU X merges luxury dining with the indulgence of an unlimited buffet, creating a “culinary journey” that emphasizes craft and quality.

Convenient Hours: Open for dinner every day (with later hours on weekends) and weekend lunch service—a flexible schedule for those looking to enjoy fresh A5 Wagyu and premium seafood at any time.


[Instagram]
Tag people: @nikuxnyc

Add location: NIKU X NYC


[Tiktok]

@ Mention: @nikuxla

Location: Midtown South (New York, United States)

Point of Contact:
ophelia: 2125108212"

https://influencers.creatorain.com/auth/creator-signup/chubby-group

In the meantime, could you please share:
a) Full name for reservation

c) Any dietary restrictions

Best,
Phillip

The overall ambiance and level of service we provide

Blair
Chubby Group

On Thu, Apr 24, 2025 at 12:05 PM April ChubbyGroup <april@collabs.chubbygroup.com> wrote:

Dear Nikki Ean,
Thank you for your interest in Chubby Cattle Chicago — we are excited to have you!​ I am confirming your reservation with our manager now, and you’ll get a final confirmation email shortly.
Your visit includes a complimentary dining experience for you and a guest, and we'd love if you shared your authentic experience with yourInstagram and TikTok audiences, highlighting:


"Location: 2162 S Archer Ave, Chicago, IL 60616

Required:
1. Premium Ingredients: Imported purebred A5 Wagyu beef flown in from Japan.

2. All-You-Can-Eat Wagyu: Offers three premium tiers ranging from $55 to $85, featuring American, Australian, and Japanese A5 Wagyu.

3. Diverse Menu: Includes not only Wagyu but also curated seafood (shrimp, scallops) and unlimited sushi (like Salmon Nigiri and Wagyu Nigiri).
Signature Hot Dishes: Features unique items like Wagyu Tartare, Sukiyaki Hot Pot, and A5 Wagyu Stone Pot Bibimbap.
Desserts and Snacks: Serves desserts like milk tea, ice cream, and Asian snacks.

4. Chubby Club Membership (Clear CTA encouraging sign-ups for Chubby Club Membership)
Membership Benefits Across 35+ Locations,
Save up to $20 per visit at any Chubby Group restaurant and VIP perks

Optional Talking Points:
5. Affordable Luxury: Serves premium wagyu at a lower cost due to bulk purchasing and in-house partnerships.

6. Interactive Dining: Automated ordering system and tableside service for quick delivery.

#Hashtages: #ChicagoFoodie #ChinatownEats #SushiLoversChicago #AllYouCanEatChicago

[Instagram]

Tag people (invite collaborators): @chubbycattlechicago @chubby.group

Add location: Chubby Cattle Chicago

[Tiktok]

@ Mention: @chubbycattlebbq

Location: Chubby Cattle BBQ | Chicago

Point of Contact:
Cecilia: 7734519398"


Feel free to follow the guidelines, but don’t hesitate to add your own flair — we want it to match your style. You can find more details and upload your content here:
https://influencers.creatorain.com/auth/creator-signup/chubby-group

In the meantime, could you please share:
a) Full name for reservation
b) A contact phone number
c) Any dietary restrictions

Best,
April

Hi Blair,

Thank you so much for reaching out and apologies for the delayed response! I had a chance to explore more about Chubby Group and your restaurants, and I’m genuinely impressed by the concept and the focus on premium Japanese Wagyu—everything looks incredible.

I’d love to take you up on the invitation! My preferred location would be NIKU X in New York City, and I’ll be bringing a plus one. I’m available on the following dates, all after 5 PM:
  • Saturday, April 26
  • Friday, May 2
  • Saturday, May 3
Please let me know if any of those dates / times work for you. Looking forward to hearing from you and getting the chance to experience the restaurant!

Best regards,
